portfolio.title: NammaBNB
portfolio.description: The Nammabnb project is designed to replicate key functionalities of the popular accommodation booking platform, Nammabnb. This project incorporates HTML, CSS, and TypeScript for the front end, and MongoDB for backend data storage.

portfolio.title: Donor Management System
portfolio.description: Our System ensures both security and efficiency in facilitating seamless data exchange between donors and patients, ensuring timely and targeted support for patients in need, With a user-friendly interface.

portfolio.title: GCP + Terraform App
portfolio.description: Managed development and production environments on GCP. Optimized workflows with GitHub Actions for CI/CD, Developed Cloud Functions for improving security, performance, and observability.

testimonial.description:
• Configured and troubleshooted aspects of SD WAN (VPN tunnel formation, routing & and switching in the wireless network division) leading to customer success.\n• Worked on an AI tool in Ansible for automation work in Change Management and Fortinet Implementation.
